alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 6:31PM CDT until June 06 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Sherman County in central Nebraska... Northeastern Dawson County in south central Nebraska... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 630 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mason City to 6 miles north of Oconto, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Litchfield around 650 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Hazard, Eddyville, Pleasanton, Sumner and Miller. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
